name: Pieter Wuille
cooked: @theStack What do you think about making a graph which puts date/time (release/commit date?) on the X axis, and perhaps a log scale on the Y axis (so that the same % improvement shows as the same distance on the graph)? That would make it less bad to add more versions to the graph as well.
topic_title: Comparing the performance of ECDSA signature validation in OpenSSL vs. libsecp256k1 over the last decade
